title: Drawing, June 3, 1857
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray paper
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at center left:  Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457e
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at right:  Guaranda June 3d 57
description: Horizontal view of houses seen from below with a cascade at left in a mountainous landscape, with broad margins on top, at right and at bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, June 3, 1857.
June 3, 1857. Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-198.
